ModuleDescription: Have you ever regretted a choice you made? Every day, we make many decisions. However, are you aware that we all possess cognitive biases that influence our choices without us knowing? These natural biases can lead us into making seemingly prudent decisions that are illogical. With a better knowledge of these inherent natural biases, we can think more clearly and make better decisions in our lives.
